title: Women of the Toubou
creator_credit: Anne Balfour Fraser and Phoenix Films
brief_description: Presents a documentary on the African tribe known as the Toubou. Explains that the tribe revolves around a strong matriarchy but is extremely protective of their beautiful, but strong, enduring, graceful women.
description: Presents a documentary on the African tribe known as the Toubou. Explains that the tribe revolves around a strong matriarchy but is extremely protective of their beautiful, but strong, enduring, graceful women.
